articles.title: Native American shell ring villages may have been occupied then abandoned because of climate change: Analysis of mollusk shells reveals environmental changes in U.S. coastal communities around 4000 years ago - Science Daily
articles.description: Mollusk shells at 4,000-year-old Native American shell ring villages indicate that environmental change may have driven the formation and abandonment of these coastal communities, according to a new study.

articles.title: Biden's State of the Union address offered a plan — but will it be enough with democracy on the line? - ABC News
articles.description: Joe Biden walked into the State of the Union speech with the voices of presidents past in his ears. And with polls showing more Americans think Biden is doing a bad job than good, some of those past presidents will be hard acts to follow, writes Stan Grant.
articles.content:
